by _.description: For apps, e.g. My Cool App, by {{name}}

Image.description: Type of block that can be added to the app

Name.description: Label on the profile page, e.g. Name: Kate, Location: Canada

App Name & Icon.description: Title within app editor for page where user can change the app name and icon

Make.description: Label for all available make templates

Make Your Own App.description: Title for app templates, starter projects/styles to create new apps

Make an App.description: Button label for action to make a new app

SMS.description: a text, as in 'Send a text message' (on a mobile phone)

name from location.description: E.g. Kate from Canada, sorry for all the html

Delete.description: Button for removing (deleting) a block or an app

Journalist.description: Title for an app for journalists

Business.description: Title for an app for business owners

From Scratch.description: Title for a blank app template. 'From Scratch' is an idiom that describes making something from the beginning with basic ingredients.

No data has been stored yet!.description: No data has been stored yet!

Publishing....description: Shows up below header when the app is being published or a publish is in progress

same as minimum number.description: place holder for Initial number field

Edit.description: Button for allowing user to edit the app

Preview.description: Button that, if clicked, shows the end product of the app

Text.description: Type of block that can be added to the app

Sign In.description: Sign In button label (logs user into Webmaker Mobile)

Try as Guest.description: Label for action that allows a user to use the app without signing in.

Guest.description: Label for author when the user is in trial mode

Guest Explanation.message: Guests can build, but not publish apps.
Guest Explanation.description: Explains the effect of using the app as a not signed in guest.

Try in Offline Mode.description: Label for action that allows a user to use the app without signing in when the device is not connected to the internet.

Offline Mode Explanation.message: This device isn't connected to the internet, so you won't be able to publish any apps.
Offline Mode Explanation.description: Explains effect of using the app without an internet connection

Sign Out.description: Button label for button that logs user out of Webmaker Mobile

Delete my Apps.description: Button to delete all of a user's apps

Text Value.description: Label for attribute of text block: the text value

Text Color.description: Label for attribute of text block: the colour of the text

Phone.description: Type of block - creates a button that calls a number

Phone #.description: Label for Phone # attribute on call/sms block

App Data.description: Form data submitted for my app

Label.description: The label on a button (for sms/calling)

errorDefault.message: Oops! There was an error. Go back to your profile?
